== Description ==
Creates a new user account.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$user_name|string|The username of the user to be created.}}
{{Parameter|$password| string | The password of the user to be created.}}}
{{Parameter|$email| string | The email address of the user to be created.}}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(integer)</tt> : id of the user created.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wpmu_create_user($user_name, $password, $email); ?>%%%
